alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Emporia; City of Franklin; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Williamsburg; Dinwiddie; Greensville; James City; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg; Nottoway; Prince George; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 26 at 11:53PM EDT until June 27 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS ISSUED SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 395 UNTIL 3 AM EDT TUESDAY WHICH REPLACES A PORTION OF SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 393. THE NEW WATCH IS VALID FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN VIRGINIA THE NEW WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHESTERFIELD CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA BRUNSWICK CITY OF HOPEWELL CITY OF PETERSBURG DINWIDDIE LUNENBURG MECKLENBURG NOTTOWAY PRINCE GEORGE IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF EMPORIA CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GREENSVILLE JAMES CITY SOUTHAMPTON SURRY SUSSEX THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANTE, BACONS CASTLE, BARHAM, BARNETTS, BEACH, BON AIR, BOOTH FORK, BOYKINS, BRUNSWICK, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, BUSCH GARDENS, CENTERVILLE, CHASE CITY, CHESTER, CHESTERFIELD, CHIPPOKES STATE PARK, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, CLARESVILLE, CLARKSVILLE, COLONIAL HEIGHTS, COURTLAND, COWIE CORNER, CREWE, CROAKER, DURAND, EDGERTON, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, EWELL, FIVE FORKS, FORT LEE, FRANKLIN, GREEN PLAIN, GROVE, GWALTNEY CORNER, HOG ISLAND GAME RESERVE, HOPEWELL, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, KENBRIDGE, LAWRENCEVILLE, MEADOWVILLE, MIDLOTHIAN, MOSELEY, PETERSBURG, POOLESVILLE, REAMS, ROXBURY, SOUTH HILL, TRIPLET, VALENTINES, VICTORIA, WAKEFIELD, WAVERLY, WAYSIDE, WHITE PLAINS, AND WILLIAMSBURG.
